name: build-tools
description: Tools to build jshero (though it also runs locally)
author: jshero authors

scripts.build_comment_0: Minifies all koans in one file (per language). Transpile template literals.
scripts.build: babel -o www/js/koans-min/koans.js src/koans/de/ && babel -o www/en/js/koans-min/koans.js src/koans/en/
